note: CKM absolute-value reference table for the ckm_full_pipeline module (PDG 2024 global fit with unitarity). Asymmetric PDG uncertainties are symmetrized using the larger of the ± errors.

reference.definition: Absolute values |V_ij| in the PDG convention (dimensionless). While |V_ij| are often quoted as low-energy fit outputs, an explicit reference scale is still useful when comparing to RG-evolved texture pipelines.
reference.scheme: PDG 2024 global-fit (unitarity enforced; effective low-energy parameters; not a running MSbar coupling)
reference.chi2_note: To avoid double-counting unitarity constraints, ckm_full_pipeline computes its diagnostic χ² on a minimal approximately-independent subset of |V_ij|. Full |V_ij| are still printed for transparency.
